name: Midnight Thief
description:
Midnight Thief is a stealth god game here you must protect your population from being detected as they collect resources for you to spend on spells!

Freeze costs 15 gold!

Knockback costs 5 gold

Slow and Hate are free!

Slow and Haste work on your own units. 

Knockback and Freeze work on both you and the Lights.

Get population above certain number. 

Keep your units from touching the light.

Keys:

Mouse 1: 

Num 1: Select Slow Ability

Num 2: Select Haste Ability

Num 3: Select Knockback Ability

Num 4: Select Freeze Ability

Submission for: Ludum Dare 41 Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres
